summary: Custom config for RCRN, new look with vanilla colors
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]RCRN v36 Custom Config[/b][/size]

[b][u]Description[/u][/b]

Postprocess injector config, ini and driver settings I\'m using with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1875]RCRN v36[/url].
Doesn\'t change the vanilla look and feel entirely but enhances them! :)
Results can be seen on screenshots.
Note: ini is for high-end rigs.

Additional info about settings (screenshots were made with them):
RCRN 3.0: Legacy
IMAGINATOR: Bloom Low, Contrast 0.6, Sky 6
MODS: Darker Nights and Bright Skies.esp, Bright Lights.esp

[b][u]How to install[/u][/b]

- Install RCRN 3.6, replace injFX_Settings.h
- Install IMAGINATOR if you want to change bloom/contrast/sky or sunlight intensity
- Apply nVidia Inspector/INI settings
- If nights are not dark enough for you in RCRN Legacy, it can be changed to Classic or Pure, but that affects interiors too, so I recommend to install 2 mods included in this custom setup (Darker Nights and Bright Skies, Bright Lights).
author: Mikanoshi
